text: Campsomerini is a cosmopolitan tribe of the family Scoliidae. An alternative representation is as a subfamily, Campsomerinae. ==Genera== Genera within this tribe include:BugGuide - Subfamily CampsomerinaeClassification and checklist of Afrotropical mammoth waspsGerard G. M. Schulten. The Flower Wasps (Hymenoptera: Scoliidae) of Papua Indonesia ==References== Category:Scoliidae Category:Parasitic wasps
title: Campsomerini
